attributes.action: Accept the democratic election of the BNP on their manifesto
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BNP were democratically elected on their manifesto. It is not relevant to agree or not with their views only that no one may force these views to be changed other then by the vote. The E & HR Commission exceed their duty and are unreasonably selective in their views on Equality and discrimination.They discriminate against white anglo-saxon people.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
